item.title: How to Create Multiple Digital Ocean Droplets and Provision Them Using Ansible
item.description: In a previous post, we saw how to create a digital ocean droplet and provision it with Ansible. Creating multiple droplets is very similar, you mostly just have to pay attention to the response object that you get back, which is different in the single vs. the many case.
